sentence.Network_en: I hope this is a portent for the rest of the year.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望这对今年余下的时间是个兆头。

sentence.Network_en: The savage civil war there could be a portent of what's to come in the rest of the region.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里发生的野蛮内战可能预示这一地区其他地方将会发生什么。

sentence.Network_en: I see it as a portent of things to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把它看作是将要到来的事物的前兆.

list.abs: To be or give sign or portent of ., 做或给出记号或预兆.
...t: including project organization and performance.5.制作部 Production portent都市风模特推广机构从事项目制作的专门机构：包括各类大型演出、时装发布、产品推介的整体编排和策划。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin portentum 'omen, token', from the verb portendere (see portend)

entry.def: A portent is something that indicates what is likely to happen in the future.

example.ex: The savage civil war there could be a portent of what's to come in the rest of the region...
example.tran: 那里发生的野蛮内战可能预示这一地区其他地方将会发生什么。

example.ex: I hope this is a portent for the rest of the year...
example.tran: 我希望这对今年余下的时间是个兆头。

means.word_mean: 1. a sign of something about to happen;

sentences.sentence: "he looked for an omen before going into battle"

auth_sentence.content: But their cartoonish one-dimensionality cancels out any real portent.
auth_sentence.res_content: But their cartoonish one-dimensionality cancels out any real portent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But their cartoonish one-dimensionality cancels out any real portent.

auth_sentence.content: Building low, I noticed; portent of a rainy summer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Building low, I noticed; portent of a rainy summer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Building low, I noticed; portent of a rainy summer.

auth_sentence.content: He will hear the magic rap of the willow wand, portent of death.
auth_sentence.res_content: He will hear the magic rap of the willow wand, portent of death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He will hear the magic rap of the willow wand, portent of death.
